text: Brentwood is a city in Contra Costa County, California, United States. As of the 2020 census, the city had a population of 64,292. This was up from 23,302 people in 2000. Brentwood is on the Sacramentoâ€“San Joaquin River Delta. It is about 55 miles (90 km) from San Francisco and 60 miles (100 km) from Sacramento by driving distance. ==References== Category:Cities in California Category:Cities in the San Francisco Bay Area Category:Settlements in Contra Costa County, California
title: Brentwood, California
